analysis.description:
GESTokenCrowdSale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#488-489) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#488-489)

Reentrancy in GESTokenCrowdSale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#460-469):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#464-465)
	- FinalisedCrowdsale(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#465-466)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#465)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalised (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#466)

GESTokenCrowdSale.GESTokenCrowdSale (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#378-423) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,51414669 * 10 ** 18) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#422-423)

GESTokenCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#430-460) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#454-455)

GESTokenCrowdSale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#460-469) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#464-465)

GESTokenCrowdSale.hardCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#356-358)
GESTokenCrowdSale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#347-349)
GESTokenCrowdSale.saleMinimumWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#354-355)
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#38-39) should be declared external
StandardToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#128-129) should be declared external

MintableToken.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#246-255) should be declared external

Pausable.unpause (/unique_chucks/2/0xfb1e5f5e984c28ad7e228cdaa1f8a0919bb6a09b.sol#294) should be declared external
